item.title: ‘Silo’ Star Lolita Chakrabarti Joins Royal Shakespeare Company’s ‘Wendy & Peter Pan’ (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: The Royal Shakespeare Company (RSC) has unveiled the complete cast for Ella Hickson’s reimagined take on J.M. Barrie’s beloved tale, with “Wendy & Peter Pan” set to make it
